description: Observations to the London Borough of Hackney in connection with proposed development to provide 2545m2 B1 space, 114 residential units and 19 live/work units, including the refurbishment of existing buildings and the construction of an eight storey block/ten storey block and 14 storey block and incorporating 51 car parking spaces and 24 scooter spaces.
decision_conditions: OBSERVATIONS:  This Council considers that the proposal by virtue of its height, scale and overdevelopment would have a severe impact on firstly the character and appearance of the adjoining East Canonbury and Arlington Square Conservation Areas, secondly, on the Rosemary Gardens public open space and thirdly on the amenity of residents, especially in Rosemary Street.
